title: Obnoxiously Cleaved Executioner

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Choose a player {to investigate} each night.
>  - {You will learn whether or not} they are a member of the Town.
- Choose a player {to target} at night.
>  - {If they are a member of the Town, they will become your target. If} they are hanged{, you will win}.
>  - {If} they {are not a member of the Town, you} will commit suicide and lose.
>  - {If} your target {dies at night, you} will commit suicide and lose.
>  - You may {only} have {one} target at {a} time.
>  - You may {not investigate and} target {in the same night.}
- Choose a player to execute at night.
>  - You will deal an Unstoppable attack to them {if they are a member of the Town}.
>  - You may {only} execute after you{r target} has been hanged.
>  - Once you successfully execute {a member of the Town}, you may {no longer} execute.
- **Cleave** during the day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Targeting is Astral and immune to transports.
- If your target is hanged and you successfully execute someone, you win the game.
- You have a layer of Basic defense that can block one attack.
- You may use each of your abilities up to twice at night if you Cleaved the previous day.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who would oppose you, or do the thing in the attributes.

desc:
